scripts.test:parallel: concurrently "cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI/addNote/*.{feature,mjs}'" "cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI/addTask/*.{feature,mjs}'" "cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI/login/*.{feature,mjs}'" "cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI/logout/*.{feature,mjs}'"
scripts.test:full: npm run clean:reports && npm run test:parallel; npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:html
